about_the_game:
FLESHLESS is an innovative fixed-camera puzzle-solving exploration platformer that has a compelling narrative.
Players are immersed in an abstract world, tasked with unraveling its intricacies and uncovering hidden secrets.
Will you successfully figure out who you are and where you are, or will you relegate to obscurity like countless others before you?
This project seamlessly melds abstract artistry with gaming experience, resulting in a unique and captivating product.

Movement: Utilize the WASD keys to navigate your character within the game environment.
Interaction: Press the 'E' key to activate various interactive elements such as levers, cogs, and other objects essential for progression and puzzle-solving.

Players are immersed in an abstract world, tasked with unraveling its intricacies and uncovering hidden secrets.
Will you successfully figure out who you are and where you are, or will you relegate to obscurity like countless others before you?
This project seamlessly melds abstract artistry with gaming experience, resulting in a unique and captivating product.

Interaction: Press the 'E' key to activate various interactive elements such as levers, cogs, and other objects essential for progression and puzzle-solving.
name: FLESHLESS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Fleshless is unique fixed camera exploration game with rich lore, where you need to explore abstract world and discover it's secrets.
